       for(Int_t i=1; i<=myLadders[k]->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; i++){ // loop on secondary ref planes
              
       //Int_t indexPlane = k*12+i;
       DPlane* myPlane = myLadders[k]->GetPlane(i);

       //std::cout<<"Writing positions and tilts for plane "<<myPlane->GetPlaneNumber()<<std::endl; 

       Float_t planeOffSetX = myLadders[k]->GetPlanePosition(i)(0);
       Float_t planeOffSetY = myLadders[k]->GetPlanePosition(i)(1);
       Float_t planeOffSetZ = myLadders[k]->GetPlanePosition(i)(2);

      sprintf( update_cfg_string, "%s %d %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f", update_cfg_string, myPlane->GetPlaneNumber(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[0]/1000.+planeOffSetX/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[1]/1000.+planeOffSetY/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[2]/1000.+planeOffSetZ/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[0]*TMath::RadToDeg(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[1]*TMath::RadToDeg(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[2]*TMath::RadToDeg());

      } //end loop on planes
           
      if( k!=0 ) {
      std::cout<<"Writing residus ..." <<std::endl;
      myLadders[k]->PrepareDisplay();
      myLadders[k]->Display( fSession->GetRunNumber() );
      }

    } // end loop on ladders

    sprintf(update_cfg_string,"%s", update_cfg_string); // add "-d" at the end for debug
    sprintf(update_cfg_string_ladders,"%s", update_cfg_string_ladders); // add "-d" at the end for debug
    cout<<update_cfg_string_ladders<<endl;
    cout<<update_cfg_string<<endl;
    gSystem->Exec(update_cfg_string_ladders);
    gSystem->Exec(update_cfg_string);
  }
 
  //-----------------------------------
  // The End

}


//______________________________________________________________________________
//
void MimosaAlignAnalysis::AlignLadderMV2(Bool_t modeAuto, const Float_t tiniBound, Int_t nAlignEvents, Int_t nAdditionalEvents, Int_t chi2Limit)
{

/*
LC 2013/09
This method make the alignment of two ladders with one ladder took like reference.
The alignment use minivectors.


       0_0  x  /
           /  /
     0_1  x  x 1_0
         /  /      |  |
        /  x 1_1   |  |
       /  /        |  |
      /  /     2_0 x  |
                   |  |
               2_1 x  x 3_0
                   |  |
                   |  x 3_1

After alignement : 
  --> 0_1 = 0_0
  --> 1_0 = 1_1
  --> 2_0 = 2_1 
  --> 3_0 = 3_1
  --> See fcnMiniVectors2

*/
 
  DTracker *tTracker  =  fSession->GetTracker();          
  Int_t  numberOfLadders = tTracker->GetNumberOfLadders();
    
  DLadder **myLadders = new DLadder*[numberOfLadders]; 
  Bool_t *stopAlignLadder = new Bool_t[numberOfLadders];

  for(Int_t j=0 ; j<numberOfLadders ; ++j) {
    myLadders[j] = tTracker->GetLadder(j+1);
    myLadders[j]->UpdateAlignment();
     std::cout<<j<<std::endl; 
    stopAlignLadder[j] = kFALSE;
  }

  Int_t counts = 0;

  fSession->SetEvents(nAlignEvents);

  while(fSession->NextRawEvent() == kTRUE ) {    
       
  counts = fSession->GetCurrentEventNumber();   
       
  //------------------
  tTracker->Update();
  //------------------
       
        
   std::vector<DTrack*> realTracks0;
   std::vector<DTrack*> realTracks1;
     
   for(Int_t itPlane=1 ; itPlane <= myLadders[0]->GetNumberOfPlanes()/2 ; ++itPlane){ 
         
     std::vector<DTrack*> myTracks0; 
     std::vector<DTrack*> myTracks1;
     std::vector<DR3> centerLadderPosition0;
     std::vector<DR3> centerLadderPosition1;
        
     myTracks0.clear();
     myTracks1.clear();
     centerLadderPosition0.clear();
     centerLadderPosition1.clear();
         
     for(Int_t ladderID=0; ladderID<numberOfLadders; ++ladderID) {
          
       if(ladderID==0) {
       myLadders[ladderID]->MakeMiniVectors(itPlane);
       myTracks0 = myLadders[ladderID]->GetMiniVectors(); 
       centerLadderPosition0 = myLadders[ladderID]->GetCenterLadderPosition();
       }
            
       if(ladderID>0) {
         myLadders[ladderID]->UpdateAlignment();
         myLadders[ladderID]->MakeMiniVectors(itPlane);
         myTracks1 = myLadders[1]->GetMiniVectors();
         centerLadderPosition1 = myLadders[ladderID]->GetCenterLadderPosition();
               
         DR3 positionPointLadder0;
         DR3 tiltPointLadder0;
         DR3 positionPointLadder1;
         DR3 tiltPointLadder1;
               
         for(Int_t i=0 ; i<myTracks0.size() ; ++i) {

           positionPointLadder0 = myTracks0[i]->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
           tiltPointLadder0 = myTracks0[i]->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ(); 
                
           DataPoints* myDataPoint0 = new DataPoints();

           myDataPoint0->Set(centerLadderPosition0[i](0), centerLadderPosition0[i](1), positionPointLadder0(0), positionPointLadder0(1), positionPointLadder0(2), tiltPointLadder0(0), tiltPointLadder0(1) );
                 
           myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint0);
           DR3 projectionPoint0 = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();

           //myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint0);
           //DR3 projectionPoint = myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();
                
           //myDataPoint0->Set(centerLadderPosition0[i](0), centerLadderPosition0[i](1), projectionPoint0(0), projectionPoint0(1), projectionPoint0(2), tiltPointLadder0(0), tiltPointLadder0(1) );
                
                
           DR3 diff;
                
           for(Int_t j=0 ; j<myTracks1.size() ; ++j) {
           
            
              // Track with 2 points.
               
              positionPointLadder1 = myTracks1[j]->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
              tiltPointLadder1 = myTracks1[j]->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ();
                    
              DataPoints* myDataPoint1 = new DataPoints();

              myDataPoint1->Set(centerLadderPosition1[j](0), centerLadderPosition1[j](1), positionPointLadder1(0), positionPointLadder1(1), positionPointLadder1(2), tiltPointLadder1(0), tiltPointLadder1(1) );    
              
              // Track with 4 points.
               
              DTrack*  myTrack_4Hits = new DTrack(4);
              Int_t trackNumber = 0;
              
              std::vector<DR3> myPlanePositions0;
              std::vector<DPlane*> myPlanes0;

              // We search the 2 points on the ladder 0 :)

              for(Int_t i = 1 ; i<=myLadders[0]->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; i+=myLadders[0]->GetNumberOfPlanes()/2 ) {
                DPlane* myPlane = myLadders[0]->GetPlane(i);
                myPlanes0.push_back(myPlane);
                DPrecAlign* myPrecAlignPlane = myPlane->GetPrecAlignment();
      
                myPrecAlignPlane->CalculateIntersection( myDataPoint1 );
      
                DR3 trackerPos = myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition();

                DR3 planePosition0 = myPrecAlignPlane->TransformHitToPlane(trackerPos); //  TransformTrackToPlane();

                myPlanePositions0.push_back( /*myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition()*/  /*planePosition0*/ planePosition0 );//myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition();
              }
             
              DHit* myHit0_0 = new DHit(myPlanePositions0[0], *myPlanes0[0], 1); // /!\ must be plane coordinate ;)
              DHit* myHit0_1 = new DHit(myPlanePositions0[1], *myPlanes0[1], 2);         
               
              myLadders[1]->MakeTrack4( myHit0_0, myHit0_1 /*myTracks0[i]->GetHit(0), myTracks0[i]->GetHit(1)*/, myTracks1[j]->GetHit(0), myTracks1[j]->GetHit(1), myTrack_4Hits, trackNumber );
                  
              DR3 positionPointLadder4 = myTrack_4Hits->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
              DR3 tiltPointLadder4 = myTrack_4Hits->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ();
              
              DataPoints* myDataPoint4 = new DataPoints();

              myDataPoint4->Set(/*centerLadderPosition1[j](0)*/positionPointLadder4(0), /*centerLadderPosition1[j](1)*/positionPointLadder4(1), positionPointLadder4(0), positionPointLadder4(1), positionPointLadder4(2), tiltPointLadder4(0), tiltPointLadder4(1) );
 
              myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint4);
              DR3 projectionPoint4 = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();
              
              /*// Track with 2 points.
               
              positionPointLadder1 = myTracks1[j]->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
              tiltPointLadder1 = myTracks1[j]->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ();
                    
              DataPoints* myDataPoint1 = new DataPoints();

              myDataPoint1->Set(centerLadderPosition1[j](0), centerLadderPosition1[j](1), positionPointLadder1(0), positionPointLadder1(1), positionPointLadder1(2), tiltPointLadder1(0), tiltPointLadder1(1) );
              */

              myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint1);
              DR3 projectionPoint1 = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();
              
              
              //myDataPoint1->Set(centerLadderPosition1[j](0), centerLadderPosition1[j](1), projectionPoint1(0), projectionPoint1(1), projectionPoint1(2), tiltPointLadder1(0), tiltPointLadder1(1) );
                  
                   
              diff = projectionPoint1-projectionPoint0;


              if( fabs(diff(0))<tiniBound && fabs(diff(1))<tiniBound && fabs(diff(2))<tiniBound && chi2Limit>myTrack_4Hits->GetChiSquare()) {
                  
                  
                  std::cout<<myTrack_4Hits->GetChiSquare()<<std::endl;
                         
                  realTracks0.push_back(myTracks0[i]);
                  realTracks1.push_back(myTracks1[j]);
                  
                  myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->NewData(myDataPoint0);
                  //myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->NewData1(myDataPoint1); // previous version
                  myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->NewData1(myDataPoint4);  // new version

                  } // end of condition
                } // end loop on tracks1
              } // end loop on tracks0
            } // end condition ladder>0
            } // end loop on ladders
          } //end loop on planes
        
        if(realTracks0.size() != 0) realTracks0.clear();
        if(realTracks1.size() != 0) realTracks1.clear();
         
        if( myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->DataSize()>0 && counts>nAlignEvents && stopAlignLadder[1]==kFALSE) {
           
           std::cout<<"//***********************************************************//"<<std::endl;
           std::cout<<"//****************** MINUIT MINIMIZATION ********************//"<<std::endl;
           std::cout<<"//***********************************************************//"<<std::endl;
           //myLadders[0]->UpdateAlignment();
           AlignMimosaMV2(myLadders[0], myLadders[1], myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign(), myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign() , modeAuto, chi2Limit);
           stopAlignLadder[1]==kTRUE; 
           //myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->ResetDataPoints();
           //myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->ResetDataPoints1();
           //myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->ResetDataPoints();
        }


        } // end loop on events
       
        // write residu histogram.

 std::cout<<"Reading additional events ..."<<std::endl;

 fSession->SetEvents(nAdditionalEvents);

 while(fSession->NextRawEvent() == kTRUE ) {    
         
   counts = fSession->GetCurrentEventNumber();   
          
   //----------------
   tTracker->Update();
   //---------------
        
   std::vector<DTrack*> realTracks0;
   std::vector<DTrack*> realTracks1;
     
   for(Int_t itPlane=1 ; itPlane <= myLadders[0]->GetNumberOfPlanes()/2 ; ++itPlane){ 
         
     std::vector<DTrack*> myTracks0; 
     std::vector<DTrack*> myTracks1;
     std::vector<DR3> centerLadderPosition0;
     std::vector<DR3> centerLadderPosition1;
        
     myTracks0.clear();
     myTracks1.clear();
     centerLadderPosition0.clear();
     centerLadderPosition1.clear();
         
     for(Int_t ladderID=0; ladderID<numberOfLadders; ++ladderID) {
          
       if(ladderID==0) {
             
       myLadders[ladderID]->MakeMiniVectors(itPlane);
       myTracks0 = myLadders[ladderID]->GetMiniVectors(); 
       centerLadderPosition0 = myLadders[ladderID]->GetCenterLadderPosition();
       }
            
       if(ladderID>0) {
         myLadders[ladderID]->UpdateAlignment();
         myLadders[ladderID]->MakeMiniVectors(itPlane);
         myTracks1 = myLadders[ladderID]->GetMiniVectors();
         centerLadderPosition1 = myLadders[ladderID]->GetCenterLadderPosition();
               
         DR3 positionPointLadder0;
         DR3 tiltPointLadder0;
         DR3 positionPointLadder1;
         DR3 tiltPointLadder1;
               
         for(Int_t i=0 ; i<myTracks0.size() ; ++i) {

           positionPointLadder0 = myTracks0[i]->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
           tiltPointLadder0 = myTracks0[i]->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ(); 
                
           DataPoints* myDataPoint0 = new DataPoints();

           myDataPoint0->Set(centerLadderPosition0[i](0), centerLadderPosition0[i](1), positionPointLadder0(0), positionPointLadder0(1), positionPointLadder0(2), tiltPointLadder0(0), tiltPointLadder0(1) );
                 
           myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint0);
           DR3 projectionPoint0 = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();

           myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint0);
           DR3 projectionPoint = myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();
                
                
           DR3 diff;      
         
           for(Int_t j=0 ; j<myTracks1.size() ; ++j) {
                
              
              positionPointLadder1 = myTracks1[j]->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
              tiltPointLadder1 = myTracks1[j]->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ();
                    
              DataPoints* myDataPoint1 = new DataPoints();

              myDataPoint1->Set(centerLadderPosition1[j](0), centerLadderPosition1[j](1), positionPointLadder1(0), positionPointLadder1(1), positionPointLadder1(2), tiltPointLadder1(0), tiltPointLadder1(1) );
                    
                   
              myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint1);
              DR3 projectionPoint1 = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();
              DR3 ladderToAlignUV = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->TransformTrackToPlane(); 
              
              DTrack*  myTrack_4Hits = new DTrack(4);
              Int_t trackNumber = 0;
                                     
              myLadders[1]->MakeTrack4(myTracks0[i]->GetHit(0), myTracks0[i]->GetHit(1), myTracks1[j]->GetHit(0), myTracks1[j]->GetHit(1), myTrack_4Hits, trackNumber );
                  
              DR3 positionPointLadder4 = myTrack_4Hits->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
              DR3 tiltPointLadder4 = myTrack_4Hits->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ();
              
              //positionPointLadder4.Print();
              //tiltPointLadder4.Print();
               
              DataPoints* myDataPoint4 = new DataPoints();


              myDataPoint4->Set( positionPointLadder4(0), positionPointLadder4(1), positionPointLadder4(0), positionPointLadder4(1), positionPointLadder4(2), tiltPointLadder4(0), tiltPointLadder4(1) );
 
               myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint4);                                                                                                           
               DR3 projectionPoint4 = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTrackPosition();
               DR3 ladderToAlignUV4 = myLadders[0]->GetPrecAlign()->TransformTrackToPlane(); 
                   
              diff = projectionPoint1-projectionPoint4;
                   
              //diff.Print();

              if( fabs(diff(0))<tiniBound && fabs(diff(1))<tiniBound && fabs(diff(2))<tiniBound) {
                       
                  realTracks0.push_back(myTracks0[i]);
                  realTracks1.push_back(myTracks1[j]);
                       
                  //myLadders[1]->FillDPrecAlign(0, projectionPoint, tiltPointLadder0);
                  //myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->NewData(myDataPoint0);
                 
                 
                  DR3 hitLadder0 = myDataPoint0->GetHitPosition(); 
                 
                  //std::cout<<"Here"<<std::endl; 
                  
                  //fAlignement0->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint1);
                  //DR3 ladderToAlignUV = fAlignement0->GetTrackPosition();
                  //DR3 ladderToAlignUV = fAlignement0->TransformTrackToPlane();
                  
                  //ladderToAlignUV = fAlignement0->TransformTrackToPlane();
                 
                  //std::cout<<"Here1"<<std::endl; 
                   
                  DR3 Diff_Locale = ladderToAlignUV4-hitLadder0;
                  //Diff_Locale.Print();


                  std::vector<Float_t> myData;
                  myData.push_back( projectionPoint1(0) ); // 0
                  myData.push_back( projectionPoint1(1) ); // 1
                  myData.push_back(0); // 2
                  myData.push_back(0); // 3
                  myData.push_back(0); // 4
                  myData.push_back( tiltPointLadder1(0) ); // 5
                  myData.push_back( tiltPointLadder1(1) ); // 6
                  myData.push_back( /*diff(0)*/ Diff_Locale(0) ); // 7
                  myData.push_back( /*diff(1)*/ Diff_Locale(1) ); // 8
                  myData.push_back(0); // 9
                  myData.push_back(0); // 10
                  myData.push_back(0); // 11
                  myData.push_back( /*diff(2)*/Diff_Locale(2) ); // 12 
                   
                  if( myTracks1[j]->GetChiSquare() <= chi2Limit ) myLadders[1]->FillResidus(myData, itPlane, tiltPointLadder1);
                  
                  // else if(myTracksi1[j]->GetChiSquare() <= chi2Limit) myLadders[1]->FillResidus(myData, p, myDxDyDz[j]);
                  
                  //myLadders[1]->FillDPrecAlign(1, projectionPoint1, tiltPointLadder1);
                  //myLadders[1]->GetPrecAlign()->NewData1(myDataPoint1);
                  } // end of condition
                } // end loop on tracks1
              } // end loop on tracks0
            } // end condition ladder>0
            } // end loop on ladders
          } //end loop on planes
        
        realTracks0.clear();
        realTracks1.clear();
         
        } // end loop on events
       
/************         
         for(Int_t itPlane=1 ; itPlane<=myLadders[0]->GetNumberOfPlanes()/2 ; ++itPlane){ 
            
            myLadders[0]->MakeMiniVectors(itPlane);
            std::vector<DTrack*> myTracks = myLadders[0]->GetMiniVectors();
            std::vector<DR3> myDxDyDz = myLadders[0]->GetDxDyDz();
             
            if(myTracks.size() != 0 ) {

             for(Int_t j=0 ; j<myTracks.size() ; ++j) {

              //std::cout<<"test0"<<std::endl;

              for(Int_t itLadder=1 ; itLadder<numberOfLadders ; ++itLadder)
              {
                for(Int_t p=1 ; p<=myLadders[itLadder]->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; ++p ) {
                  DPlane* myPlane = myLadders[itLadder]->GetPlane(p);
                    
                    std::vector<Float_t> myData;
                    myPlane->AlignData(myTracks[j], tiniBound, myData);

                    if( myData.size()!=0 ){
                      if(chi2Limit == 0) myLadders[itLadder]->FillResidus(myData, p, myDxDyDz[j]);
                      else if(myTracks[j]->GetChiSquare() <= chi2Limit) myLadders[itLadder]->FillResidus(myData, p, myDxDyDz[j]);
                    }
                    myData.clear();
                } // end loop on plane
              
              } // end loop on ladders
            } // end loop on tracks
         }// end if

       } //end loop on planes

***********************/


  if( nAlignEvents>0 ) {
    cout << endl << "***************************************" << endl;
    cout << endl << "Applying results ...." << endl;
    Char_t update_cfg_string[5000];
    Char_t update_cfg_string_ladders[2000];

     sprintf(update_cfg_string,"Update_conf_align2D %s/run%d.cfg", fSession->GetConfigPath().Data(), fSession->GetRunNumber());
     sprintf(update_cfg_string_ladders,"Update_conf_Ladders %s/run%d.cfg", fSession->GetConfigPath().Data(), fSession->GetRunNumber());
          
     for(Int_t k=0; k<numberOfLadders ; ++k){
          
       sprintf( update_cfg_string_ladders, "%s %d %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f", update_cfg_string_ladders, k+1, myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[0]/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[1]/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[2]/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[0]*TMath::RadToDeg(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[1]*TMath::RadToDeg(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[2]*TMath::RadToDeg());

       if( k==0 && myLadders[k]->GetPlaneType() == "SimpleFace" ) k++;

       for(Int_t i=1; i<=myLadders[k]->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; i++){ // loop on secondary ref planes
              
       //Int_t indexPlane = k*12+i;
       DPlane* myPlane = myLadders[k]->GetPlane(i);

       //std::cout<<"Writing positions and tilts for plane "<<myPlane->GetPlaneNumber()<<std::endl; 

       Float_t planeOffSetX = myLadders[k]->GetPlanePosition(i)(0);
       Float_t planeOffSetY = myLadders[k]->GetPlanePosition(i)(1);
       Float_t planeOffSetZ = myLadders[k]->GetPlanePosition(i)(2);

      sprintf( update_cfg_string, "%s %d %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f %10.5f", update_cfg_string, myPlane->GetPlaneNumber(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[0]/1000.+planeOffSetX/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[1]/1000.+planeOffSetY/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetTranslation()[2]/1000.+planeOffSetZ/1000., myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[0]*TMath::RadToDeg(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[1]*TMath::RadToDeg(), myLadders[k]->GetPrecAlign()->GetRotations()[2]*TMath::RadToDeg());

      } //end loop on planes
           
      if( k!=0 ) {
      std::cout<<"Writing residus ..." <<std::endl;
      myLadders[k]->PrepareDisplay();
      myLadders[k]->Display( fSession->GetRunNumber() );
      }

    } // end loop on ladders

    sprintf(update_cfg_string,"%s", update_cfg_string); // add "-d" at the end for debug
    sprintf(update_cfg_string_ladders,"%s", update_cfg_string_ladders); // add "-d" at the end for debug
    cout<<update_cfg_string_ladders<<endl;
    cout<<update_cfg_string<<endl;
    gSystem->Exec(update_cfg_string_ladders);
    gSystem->Exec(update_cfg_string);
  }
 
  //-----------------------------------
  // The End

}

//______________________________________________________________________________
//
void  MimosaAlignAnalysis::UpdateConfAlign2D(Int_t nSecPlanes, DPlane** SecPlane)
{
  fstream  configFileOld;
  fstream  configFileNew;
  Char_t configFileName[5000];
  sprintf(configFileName,"%s/run%d.cfg", /*DSession::Instance()*/fSession->GetConfigPath().Data(), /*DSession::Instance()*/fSession->GetRunNumber());
  configFileOld.open(configFileName, ios::in);
  sprintf(configFileName,"%s/run%d_new.cfg", /*DSession::Instance()*/fSession->GetConfigPath().Data(), /*DSession::Instance()*/fSession->GetRunNumber());
  printf("MAlign: creating new config file %s\n", configFileName);
  configFileNew.open(configFileName, ios::out);
  Char_t tmp[255];
         
  TString key;
  //  sprintf( update_cfg_string, "%s %d %.3f %.3f %.3f", update_cfg_string, SecPlane[i]->GetPlaneNumber(), SecPlane[i]->GetTiltW()*TMath::RadToDeg(), SecPlane[i]->GetPositionU(), SecPlane[i]->GetPositionV()); // conversion for the tilt: radians->degrees, JB 2010/12/14
         
         
   while (!configFileOld.eof()) {
     configFileOld.getline(tmp, 255);
     key = tmp;
     configFileNew << tmp;
     configFileNew << "\n";
     if (key.Contains("InputNumber:")) {
       Int_t pos = key.First(':');
       TString sIdx = key(pos+1, key.Length());
       Int_t idx = (Int_t)sIdx.Atoi();
       for (Int_t i = 0; i < nSecPlanes; ++i) {
         if (idx == SecPlane[i]->GetPlaneNumber()){
           UpdateConfAlignUVW(configFileOld, configFileNew, SecPlane[i]);
           break;
         }
      }
    } 
  }
  configFileOld.close();
}


//______________________________________________________________________________  
//
void MimosaAlignAnalysis::UpdateConfAlignUVW(fstream &fileIn, fstream &fileOut, DPlane* SecPlane)
{
  Char_t tmp[255];
  TString key;
  while (!fileIn.eof()) {
    fileIn.getline(tmp, 255);
    key = tmp;
    if (key.Contains("AlignementU:")) {
      key = "AlignementU:";
      TString sIdx = Form("       %8.3f\n", SecPlane->GetPositionU());
      TString line = key+sIdx;
      fileOut << line.Data();
      fileIn.getline(tmp, 255);
      key = "AlignementV:";
      sIdx =  Form("       %8.3f\n", SecPlane->GetPositionV());
      line = key + sIdx;
      fileOut << line.Data();
      fileIn.getline(tmp, 255);
      key = "AlignementTilt:";
      sIdx =  Form("    %6.3f\n", SecPlane->GetTiltW()*TMath::RadToDeg());
      line = key + sIdx;
      fileOut << line.Data();
      break;
    }
    else {
       fileOut << tmp;
       fileOut << "\n";
    }
  } 
}


void MimosaAlignAnalysis::Gener(Double_t* xp, Double_t* yp, Double_t& aX, Double_t& bX, Double_t& aY, Double_t& bY, Double_t* sigX, Double_t* disX, Double_t* sigY, Double_t* disY, Double_t* z, Double_t* phi)
{
  aX = 10.*gRandom->Uniform(-1,1);
  bX = gRandom->Gaus(0, 0.3);
  aY = 10.*gRandom->Uniform(-1,1);
  bY = gRandom->Gaus(0, 0.3);

  Int_t nPlanes = 48;

  Float_t x[nPlanes], y[nPlanes];
         
  for (Int_t i = 0; i < nPlanes; ++i) {
    x[i] = (aX + bX*z[i] + sigX[i]*gRandom->Uniform(0,1));
    y[i] = (aY + bY*z[i] + sigY[i]*gRandom->Uniform(0,1));
    //	  Float_t cosPhi = TMath::Cos(phi[i]);
    //	  Float_t sinPhi = TMath::Sin(phi[i]);
           
    //	  xp[i] =  x[i]*cosPhi - y[i]*sinPhi + disX[i];
    //	  yp[i] =  x[i]*sinPhi + y[i]*cosPhi + disY[i];
           
    xp[i] =  x[i]        - y[i]*phi[i] + disX[i];
    yp[i] =  x[i]*phi[i] + y[i]        + disY[i];
  }
}

//______________________________________________________________________________  
//
void MimosaAlignAnalysis::AlignTrackerMillepede(Int_t nAlignEvents)
{
         // Macro performs an alignement of the telescope in the coordinate system of 
         // tracker using the Millipede package
         fSession->SetEvents(nAlignEvents);   
         DTracker* tTracker = fSession->GetTracker();
         Int_t     nPlanes  = tTracker->GetPlanesN();
         
         std::cout<<"Read "<< nPlanes << " planes." << std::endl;
         // events to read
         //fSession->SetEvents(nAlignEvents); // (bellow 5000)
      /*
      // Macro Millepede :)
         Int_t nPlanes = 48;

         Int_t nParPlanes = 3;
         Int_t nLocPar    = 4;
         Int_t nParam     = nParPlanes*nPlanes;


         MMillepede* alignment = new MMillepede();
         alignment->InitMille(nParam, nLocPar, 3, 10, 10);
         alignment->SetIterations(50);

         Double_t z[]    = {5.,    9., 20.,   25.,   30.,   35.,   40.,    45.};
         Double_t sigX[] = {0.02,  0.02, 0.03, 0.03  ,0.03,  0.03,  0.03,   0.03};
         Double_t sigY[] = {0.02,  0.02, 0.03, 0.03,  0.03,  0.03,  0.03,   0.03};

         
         Double_t disX[] = {0.00, -0.04, 0.15, 0.03, -0.075, 0.045, 0.035, -0.08};
         Double_t disY[] = {0.00, -0.03, 0.10, 0.02, -0.070, 0.040, 0.030, -0.07};
       
         Double_t x[nPlanes];
         Double_t y[nPlanes];
         Double_t aX,bX;
         Double_t aY,bY;
         
         Double_t parameters[nParam];
         Double_t errors[nParam];
         Double_t pulls[nParam];
         Double_t gloPar[nParam];
         Double_t locPar[nLocPar];
         Double_t gloConst[nParam];

         Double_t phi[] = {0., 2., -1., 1., 1., -1., 3., 1.};
        // Double_t phi[] = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0};
         
         for(Int_t k = 0; k < nPlanes; ++k)  {
           phi[k] = phi[k]*TMath::DegToRad();
           disX[k] += 2;
           disY[k] += 1;
         }
         
         for(Int_t k = 0; k < nParam; ++k) {
           parameters[k]=0.;
           errors[k]=0.;
           pulls[k]=0.;
         }
            
         gloConst[0] = 0;
         gloConst[1] = 0;
         gloConst[2] = 0;

         for(Int_t k = 1; k < nPlanes; ++k) {
           gloConst[nParPlanes*k+0] = 0.;
           gloConst[nParPlanes*k+1] = 0.;
           gloConst[nParPlanes*k+2] = 0.;
           alignment->SetParSigma(nParPlanes*k+0, 0.05);
           alignment->SetParSigma(nParPlanes*k+1, 0.05);
           alignment->SetParSigma(nParPlanes*k+2, 0.02);
         }
         
         alignment->SetParSigma(0, 0.0);
         alignment->SetParSigma(1, 0.0);
         alignment->SetParSigma(2, 0.0);
         
         Double_t trackParams[nLocPar*2];
         for(Int_t k = 0; k < nLocPar*2; ++k) 
           trackParams[k] = 0.;

        // alignment->SetGlobalConstraint(gloConst, 0.0);
         alignment->SetGlobalParameters(parameters);
            
         for (Int_t iEvent = 0; iEvent < nAlignEvents; ++iEvent) {
           Gener(x, y, aX, bX, aY, bY, sigX, disX, sigY, disY, z, phi);
           for (Int_t iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlanes; ++iPlane) {
             locPar[0] = 1;
             locPar[1] = z[iPlane];
             locPar[2] = 0;
             locPar[3] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+0] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+1] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+2] = 0;//-y[iPlane];//-(aY + bY*z[iPlane]);
             alignment->SetLocalEquation(gloPar, locPar, x[iPlane], sigX[iPlane]);
             locPar[0] = 0;
             locPar[1] = 0;
             locPar[2] = 1;
             locPar[3] = z[iPlane];
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+0] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+1] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+2] = 0;//x[iPlane];//(aX + bX*z[iPlane]);
             alignment->SetLocalEquation(gloPar, locPar, y[iPlane], sigY[iPlane]);
           }
           
           alignment->LocalFit(iEvent, trackParams, 1);
           
           for (Int_t iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlanes; ++iPlane) {
             locPar[0] = 1;
             locPar[1] = z[iPlane];
             locPar[2] = 0;
             locPar[3] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+0] = 1;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+1] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+2] = -(trackParams[4]+trackParams[6]*z[iPlane]);
             alignment->SetLocalEquation(gloPar, locPar, x[iPlane], sigX[iPlane]);
             locPar[0] = 0;
             locPar[1] = 0;
             locPar[2] = 1;
             locPar[3] = z[iPlane];
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+0] = 0;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+1] = 1;
             gloPar[nParPlanes*iPlane+2] = (trackParams[0]+trackParams[2]*z[iPlane]);
             alignment->SetLocalEquation(gloPar, locPar, y[iPlane], sigY[iPlane]);
           }
           
           Int_t iRes = alignment->LocalFit(iEvent, trackParams, 0);

      //	  printf("Res %d param %6.3f %6.3f %6.3f %6.3f    %6.3f %6.3f %6.3f %6.3f\n", iRes,
      //			 aX, trackParams[0], bX, trackParams[2], 
      //			 aY, trackParams[4], bY, trackParams[6] );
           if (iRes)
             alignment->SetNLocalEquations(alignment->GetNLocalEquations()+1);
         }// event
         alignment->GlobalFit(parameters, errors, pulls);   
         
         for (Int_t iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlanes; ++iPlane) {
           printf("Plane %2d: DisplacementX %7.4f %7.4f %7.4f  ", iPlane+1, disX[iPlane], parameters[nParPlanes*iPlane+0]+2, errors[nParPlanes*iPlane+0]);
           printf("DisplacementY %7.4f %7.4f %7.4f   ", disY[iPlane], parameters[nParPlanes*iPlane+1]+1, errors[nParPlanes*iPlane+1]);
           printf("Rotation %7.4f %7.4f\n", phi[iPlane], parameters[nParPlanes*iPlane+2]);
         }
      */

        DPlane **Planes = new DPlane*[nPlanes];

        for(Int_t i=1; i<=nPlanes; ++i){
          Planes[i] =  tTracker->GetPlane(i);
          //SecPlane[i]->GetAlignment()->SetBounding(tiniBound);
        }

         //init Millipede
        
         Int_t nParPlanes = 3;
         Int_t nParam     = nParPlanes*nPlanes;
         Int_t nLocPar    = 4;
         Int_t stdDev     = 3;

         Double_t parameters[nParam];
         Double_t errors[nParam];
         Double_t pulls[nParam];
         Double_t gloConst[nPlanes];
         
         for(Int_t k = 0; k < nParam; ++k) {
           parameters[k] = 0.;
           errors[k]     = 0.;
           pulls[k]      = 0.;
           gloConst[k]   = 0.;
         }
         
         Double_t trackParams[nLocPar*2];
         for(Int_t k = 0; k < nLocPar*2; ++k) 
           trackParams[k] = 0.;
         
         // init millepede
         fAlignment->Init(nParam, nLocPar, stdDev, nPlanes);
         fAlignment->SetIterations(20);

         for(Int_t k = 1; k <= nPlanes; ++k) {
           DPlane* tPlane = tTracker->GetPlane(k);
           if(k==1) {
              DR3 planePosition = Planes[k]->GetPosition();
              fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k-3, /*planePosition(0)*/0.);  // PositionX: -50.73  PositionsY:   0  PositionsZ:     38.9705
              fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k-2, /*planePosition(1)*/0.);
              fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k-1, /*planePosition(2)*/0.1);
           } 
           else {
              DR3 planePosition = Planes[k]->GetPosition();
              Float_t tiltW = Planes[k]->GetTiltW();
              parameters[nParPlanes*k-3] = planePosition(0);
              parameters[nParPlanes*k-2] = planePosition(1);
              parameters[nParPlanes*k-1] = tiltW;

              //fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k+0, planePosition(0) );
              //fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k+1, planePosition(1) );
              //fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k+2, planePosition(2) );
           }
               
             if (tPlane->GetStatus() == 1) {
             fAlignment->FixPlane(k);
           } else {
             fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k+0, 0.);
             fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k+1, 0.);
             fAlignment->FixParameter(nParPlanes*k+2, 0.2);
           }
           
           }

         // fix first plane.  
         fAlignment->FixPlane(0);

         fAlignment->InitGlobalParameters(parameters);
         fAlignment->AddConstraint(gloConst, 0.0);
         
         // loop over events
         Int_t nTrack = 0;
         
         while(fSession->NextRawEvent() == kTRUE) {    
           
           tTracker->Update();
           
           for( Int_t iTrack = 0; iTrack < tTracker->GetTracksN(); ++iTrack ) { 
             DTrack* aTrack = tTracker->GetTrack(iTrack);
             
             //Double_t ux = aTrack->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin()(0);
             //Float_t slopeX = aTrack->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ()(0);
             //Float_t slopeY = aTrack->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ()(1);
             //std::cout<<"ux = "<<ux<<"   slopeX = "<< slopeX<<" slopeY = "<< slopeY <<std::endl;

      //		 if (fabs(slopeX) < 5e-3 || fabs(slopeY) < 5e-3) continue;
               
             fAlignment->ProcessTrack(aTrack);
             fAlignment->LocalFit(nTrack,trackParams,1);
             
             fAlignment->ProcessTrack(aTrack, trackParams);
             fAlignment->LocalFit(nTrack++,trackParams,0);
         
            /* 
             printf("param %6.3f %6.3f %e %e    %6.3f %6.3f %e %e\n",
                  aTrack->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin()(0), trackParams[0], aTrack->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ()(0), trackParams[2], 
                  aTrack->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin()(1), trackParams[4], aTrack->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ()(1), trackParams[6] );
            */
           } // end loop on tracks
               
         }   
         fAlignment->GlobalFit(parameters,errors,pulls);
            
         // update
         Float_t       tNewTiltW;
         Float_t       tNewOffsetU;
         Float_t       tNewOffsetV;
         
         DPlane **secPlane = new DPlane*[nPlanes];

         for(Int_t i = 0; i < nPlanes; i++) {
           secPlane[i] =  tTracker->GetPlane(i+1);
           tNewOffsetU = secPlane[i]->GetPositionU() - parameters[i*fAlignment->GetNParPlane() + 0];
           std::cout<<"tNewOffsetU = "<<tNewOffsetU<<std::endl;
           
           secPlane[i]->SetPositionU(tNewOffsetU);
           tNewOffsetV = secPlane[i]->GetPositionV() - parameters[i*fAlignment->GetNParPlane() + 1];
           std::cout<<"tNewOffsetV = "<<tNewOffsetV<<std::endl;

           secPlane[i]->SetPositionV(tNewOffsetV);
           tNewTiltW   = secPlane[i]->GetTiltW()     - parameters[i*fAlignment->GetNParPlane() + 2];
           secPlane[i]->SetTiltW(tNewTiltW);
           std::cout<<"tNewTiltW  = "<<tNewTiltW<<std::endl;
         }
         
         UpdateConfAlign2D(nPlanes, secPlane);
         delete [] secPlane;

      }

//______________________________________________________________________________
//

void FCNAlignMimosa(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
  // static fcn wrapper for Minuit

  //MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);
   MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcn(n, gin, f, par , iflag); 
  //fgInstance->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);

} 

//______________________________________________________________________________
//

void FCNAlignMimosaLadder(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
  // static fcn wrapper for Minuit

  //MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);
   MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcnLadder(n, gin, f, par , iflag); 
  //fgInstance->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);

}

//______________________________________________________________________________
//

void FCNAlignMimosaMV(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
  // static fcn wrapper for Minuit

  //MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);
   MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcnMiniVectors(n, gin, f, par , iflag); 
  //fgInstance->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);

}

//______________________________________________________________________________
//

void FCNAlignMimosaMV2(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
  // static fcn wrapper for Minuit

  //MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);
   MimosaAlignAnalysis::Instance()->fcnMiniVectors2(n, gin, f, par , iflag); 
  //fgInstance->fcn(n,gin,f,par,iflag);

}

//______________________________________________________________________________
//
      
void  MimosaAlignAnalysis::fcn(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
  // fcn function used by the MINUIT Fitter
       
  DR3 CurPoint;
  DR3 CurHit;
  DR3 Correction;

  Double_t resolution[3] = {5,5,100.0} ; // ??
 
  if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
  { 
    printf("Rotations : %11f %11f %11f\n",par[0],par[1],par[2]);
    printf("Translat. : %11f %11f %11f \n",par[3],par[4],par[5]);
    cout << "+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++" << endl;
  }  
       
  fAlignement->SetTranslation(par[3],par[4],par[5]);
  fAlignement->SetRotations(par[0],par[1],par[2]);
  // cout << "+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++" << endl;

  //Compute the chi-square
  f=0.0 ;

  TList *data = fAlignement->GetDataPoints() ;

  if (iflag==8) {
    fDu->Reset();
    fDv->Reset();
  }

  // cout << "+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++" << endl;
  DataPoints *current ;
  current = (DataPoints*) data->First();
  Int_t ipt=0 ;

  while(current) {
  // CurPoint = fAlignement->TransformTrackToPlane(current);
  CurHit   = current->GetHitPosition(); // get hit position measured in local system
  if(AlignDebug >= 3) { cout << "got hit position" << endl;}
  fAlignement->CalculateIntersection(current);  // get hit position measured by RS in xyz
  CurPoint = fAlignement->TransformTrackToPlane(); // transform xyz -> uv
  for (Int_t i=0 ; i<3 ; i++){
    Double_t tmp = (CurPoint(i)-CurHit(i))/resolution[i] ;
    f+= tmp*tmp;
  }
  if (iflag==8) {
    DR3 temp = CurPoint-CurHit ;

    if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
    { 
      printf("Point : ") ; CurPoint.Print() ;
      printf("Hit   : ") ; CurHit.Print() ;
      printf("diff  : ") ; temp.Print() ;
      printf("\n") ;
    }

    fGraph[0].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(0),temp(0));
    fGraph[1].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(0),temp(1));
    fGraph[2].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(1),temp(0));
    fGraph[3].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(1),temp(1));
    fDu->Fill(temp(0));
    fDv->Fill(temp(1));
  }
 
   current=(DataPoints*) data->After(current) ;
   ipt++;
 }

  if (iflag==9) {
    fAlignement->ListDataPoints();
  }
  if (iflag==10) {
    fGraph[0].Print();
  }

  if (iflag==8) 
  {
    if(AlignDebug >= 3) {fAlignement->PrintRotationMatrix();}
    TPostScript ps("residus.ps"); //,-113
    ps.NewPage();
    //fCnv = new TCanvas("Cnv","Residues after alignment",2,10,400,500);
    //fCnv->Divide(1,2);
    fCnv->cd(1);
    fDu->Fit("gaus","q");
    //fDu->Draw();
    //fCnv->Update();
           
    fCnv->cd(2);
    //gStyle->SetOptFit(1);
    /*
    fMyfit->SetParameter(0,250);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(1,50); // was 10
    fMyfit->SetParameter(2,4);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(3,500);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(4,-20);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(5,5);
    */
    fDv->Fit("gaus","q");
    //fDv->Draw();
    fCnv->Update();
    fCnv->Draw();
    // fCnv->Paint();
    ps.NewPage();

    for (Int_t i=0; i<4 ; i++) {
      fCcr->cd(i+1);
      fGraph[i].SetMarkerStyle(24);
      fGraph[i].SetMarkerColor(2);
      fGraph[i].SetMarkerSize(0.2);
      fGraph[i].Draw("AP");
    } 
    fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
    fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DU");
    //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
    fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DV");
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("V hit");
    fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DU");
    // fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    // fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("V hit");
    fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DV");
    // fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    //fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fCcr->Update();
    fCcr->Draw();
    // fCcr->Paint();

    gROOT->GetListOfCanvases()->Write();
    ps.Close();    
       
  }

  Double_t mypar[3];
  for(Int_t i=0; i<3; i++){
    mypar[i] = par[i]*180.00/3.141592653;
    mypar[i] = fmod(mypar[i],360.);
  }
       
  if(AlignDebug >=3) { printf(" tilt Z= %f \n tilt Y= %f \n tilt Z= %f \n Shift X= %f \n Shift Y= %f \n Z= %f \n N of entries %d Chi2 %f Chi2/DoF %f\n",mypar[0],mypar[1],mypar[2],par[3],par[4],par[5], ipt, f ,f/ipt);}

  //if (batch_mode == 1) cnv->SaveAs("t.ps");
}
      
 
//______________________________________________________________________________
//
      
void  MimosaAlignAnalysis::fcnLadder(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
  // fcn function used by the MINUIT Fitter
       
  DR3 CurPoint;
  DR3 CurHit;
  DR3 Correction;

  Double_t resolution[3] = {5,5,100.0} ; // ??
 
  if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
  { 
    printf("Rotations : %11f %11f %11f\n",par[0],par[1],par[2]);
    printf("Translat. : %11f %11f %11f \n",par[3],par[4],par[5]);
    cout << "+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++" << endl;
  }  
       
  fAlignement->SetTranslation(par[3],par[4],par[5]);
  fAlignement->SetRotations(par[0],par[1],par[2]);
  
  ladderToAlign->UpdateAlignment(); // Update the DPrecAlign of the planes :)

  //Compute the chi-square
  f=0.0 ;

  if (iflag==8) {
    fDu->Reset();
    fDv->Reset();
  }

  Int_t ipt=0;

  for(Int_t i=1 ; i<=ladderToAlign->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; ++i) {
    
     TList* data = ladderToAlign->GetPlane(i)->GetPrecAlignment()->GetDataPoints();
     DataPoints *current ;
     current = (DataPoints*) data->First();
 
     DPrecAlign* fAlignPlane = ladderToAlign->GetPlane(i)->GetPrecAlignment();
     
     while(current) {
       CurHit   = current->GetHitPosition(); // get hit position measured in local system
       if(AlignDebug >= 3) { cout << "got hit position" << endl;}
       fAlignPlane->CalculateIntersection(current);  // get hit position measured by RS in xyz
       CurPoint = fAlignPlane->TransformTrackToPlane(); // transform xyz -> uv
       for (Int_t j=0 ; j<3 ; j++){
         Double_t tmp = (CurPoint(j)-CurHit(j))/resolution[j] ;
         f+= tmp*tmp;
       }
       if (iflag==8) {
         DR3 temp = CurPoint-CurHit ;

       if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
         {
           printf("Point : ") ; CurPoint.Print() ;
           printf("Hit   : ") ; CurHit.Print() ;
           printf("diff  : ") ; temp.Print() ;
           printf("\n") ;
         }
        
        fGraph[0].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(0),temp(0));
        fGraph[1].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(0),temp(1));
        fGraph[2].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(1),temp(0));
        fGraph[3].SetPoint(ipt,CurHit(1),temp(1));
        fDu->Fill(temp(0));
        fDv->Fill(temp(1));
       }
 
       current=(DataPoints*) data->After(current) ;
       ipt++;
     }
   }
 
  if (iflag==10) {
    fGraph[0].Print();
  }

  if (iflag==8) 
  {
    TPostScript ps("residus.ps"); //,-113
    ps.NewPage();
//    fCnv = new TCanvas("Cnv","Residues after alignment",2,10,400,500);
//    fCnv->Divide(1,2);
    fCnv->cd(1);
    fDu->Fit("gaus","q");
    //fDu->Draw();
    //fCnv->Update();
           
    fCnv->cd(2);
    //gStyle->SetOptFit(1);
    /*
    fMyfit->SetParameter(0,250);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(1,50); // was 10
    fMyfit->SetParameter(2,4);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(3,500);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(4,-20);
    fMyfit->SetParameter(5,5);
    */
    fDv->Fit("gaus","q");
    //fDv->Draw();
    fCnv->Update();
    fCnv->Draw();
    // fCnv->Paint();
    ps.NewPage();

    for (Int_t i=0; i<4 ; i++) {
      fCcr->cd(i+1);
      fGraph[i].SetMarkerStyle(24);
      fGraph[i].SetMarkerColor(2);
      fGraph[i].SetMarkerSize(0.2);
      fGraph[i].Draw("AP");
    } 
    
    fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
    fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DU");
    //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
    fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DV");
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("V hit");
    fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DU");
    // fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    // fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("V hit");
    fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DV");
    // fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    //fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
    fCcr->Update();
    fCcr->Draw();
    // fCcr->Paint();

    gROOT->GetListOfCanvases()->Write();
    ps.Close();    
       
  }

  Double_t mypar[3];
  for(Int_t i=0; i<3; i++){
    mypar[i] = par[i]*180.00/3.141592653;
    mypar[i] = fmod(mypar[i],360.);
  }
       
  if(AlignDebug >=3) { printf(" tilt Z= %f \n tilt Y= %f \n tilt Z= %f \n Shift X= %f \n Shift Y= %f \n Z= %f \n N of entries %d Chi2 %f Chi2/DoF %f\n",mypar[0],mypar[1],mypar[2],par[3],par[4],par[5], ipt, f ,f/ipt);}

}

//______________________________________________________________________________
//

void  MimosaAlignAnalysis::fcnMiniVectors(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
     // fcn function used by the MINUIT Fitter
     //std::cout<<"fcn function used by the MINUIT Fitter"<<std::endl; 
     //DR3 Correction;
     
     Double_t resolution[3] = {3.5,3.5,10.0} ; // ??
     
     if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
     { 
         printf("Rotations : %11f %11f %11f\n",par[0],par[1],par[2]);
         printf("Translat. : %11f %11f %11f \n",par[3],par[4],par[5]);
         cout << "+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++" << endl;
      }  
   
//     ladderToAlign->UpdateAlignment();

     Double_t* initialRotations = fAlignement->GetInitialRotations();
     Double_t* initialPosition = fAlignement->GetInitialPosition(); 

     //std::cout<<"initialPositionX = "<<initialPosition[0]<<"  initialPositionY = "<<initialPosition[1]<<"  initialPositionZ = "<<initialPosition[2]<<std::endl;

     //ladderToAlign->UpdateAlignment();

     fAlignement->SetTranslation(par[3],par[4],par[5]);
     fAlignement->SetRotations(par[0],par[1],par[2]);
     
     //fAlignement->PrintAll();
      
     ladderToAlign->UpdateAlignment();

     //fAlignement->PrintAll();

     std::cout<<" Th0 = "<<par[0]*180/3.141592653<<" Th1 = "<<par[1]*180/3.141592653<<" Th3 = "<<par[2]*180/3.141592653<<std::endl;
     std::cout<<"   X = "<<par[3]-2*(par[3]-initialPosition[0])<<"   Y = "<<par[4]-2*(par[4]-initialPosition[1])<<"   Z = "<<par[5]-2*(par[5]-initialPosition[2])<<std::endl;

     //Compute the chi-square
     f=0.0;

     TList *dataMV0 =  fAlignement->GetDataPoints();
     TList *dataMV =  fAlignement->GetDataPoints1();

     Int_t sizeMin = TMath::Min( fAlignement->DataSize(), fAlignement->DataSize1() );
      
     if (iflag==8) {
       fDu->Reset();
       fDv->Reset();
       fDw->Reset();
       fDdu->Reset();
       fDdv->Reset();
       fDdw->Reset();
     }

     DataPoints *currentMV0;
     DataPoints *currentMV;

     currentMV0 = (DataPoints*) dataMV0->First();
     currentMV = (DataPoints*) dataMV->First();

     Float_t sigmaX = 4.0;
     Float_t sigmaY = 4.0;
     Float_t sigmaZ = 4.0;

     Int_t ipt=0 ;

  while(/*currentMV*/ sizeMin>0) {
   
    DR3 hitLadder0 = currentMV0->GetHitPosition();
    DR3 ladderToAlignUV = currentMV->GetHitPosition();

    DR3 trackOriginLadder0 = currentMV0->GetTrackOrigin();
    DR3 pointLadderToAlign = currentMV->GetTrackOrigin();

    DR3 tiltLadder0 = currentMV0->GetTrackDirection();
    DR3 tiltLadderToAlign = currentMV->GetTrackDirection();

    // The ladder move. We compute the new positions and tilts of minivectors.

    fAlignement->CalculateIntersection(currentMV);
    pointLadderToAlign = fAlignement->GetTrackPosition();
    ladderToAlignUV = fAlignement->TransformTrackToPlane();
    //DR3 Point = pointLadderToAlign;//fAlignement->TransformHitToTracker(ladderToAlignUV);
     
     DR3 Point2 = fAlignement->RotateToTracker(ladderToAlignUV);

/*
     Int_t sign0, sign1, sign2 = 0;
     if( (par[3]-fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[0])>=0 ) sign0 = 1; else sign0 =-1;
     if( (par[4]-fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[1])>=0 ) sign1 = 1; else sign1 =-1;
     if( (par[5]-fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[2])>=0 ) sign2 = 1; else sign2 =-1;
*/

     Point2(0) += /*sign0 */ fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[0];
     Point2(1) += /*sign1 */ fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[1];
     Point2(2) += /*sign2 */ fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[2];
    
    tiltLadderToAlign(0) = tiltLadderToAlign(0) + (par[0]-initialRotations[0]) /*fmod( (initialRotations[2]-par[2]), 3.14159265359 )*/;
    tiltLadderToAlign(1) = tiltLadderToAlign(1) + (par[1]-initialRotations[1]) /*fmod( (initialRotations[1]-par[1]), 3.14159265359 )*/;
    tiltLadderToAlign(2) = tiltLadderToAlign(2) + (par[2]-initialRotations[2]) /*fmod( (initialRotations[0]-par[0]), 3.14159265359 )*/;

    //std::cout<<"th3 = "<<par[2]<<"   rotation initiale = "<<initialRotations[2]<<"   diff = "<<par[2]-initialRotations[2]<<std::endl;

    tiltLadderToAlign(0) /= tiltLadderToAlign(2);  // fabs ?
    tiltLadderToAlign(1) /= tiltLadderToAlign(2);
    tiltLadderToAlign(2) /= tiltLadderToAlign(2);

    DataPoints* afterMoveLadder = new DataPoints(ladderToAlignUV(0), ladderToAlignUV(1), Point2(0), Point2(1), Point2(2) /*pointLadderToAlign(0), pointLadderToAlign(1), pointLadderToAlign(2)*/ , tiltLadderToAlign(0),  tiltLadderToAlign(1) );
  
    
    // Compute the intersection with Ladder0

    fAlignement0->CalculateIntersection(afterMoveLadder);
    pointLadderToAlign = fAlignement0->GetTrackPosition();
    ladderToAlignUV = fAlignement0->TransformTrackToPlane();
  
    delete afterMoveLadder;
  
    Float_t deltaZ = 1044.5*2.; // Dans le repere de l'echelle tjrs 2000 :) //*cos( (initialRotations[2]-par[2]) )*cos( (initialRotations[1]-par[1]) ); //ladderToAlignUV(2)-hitLadder0(2);
    
    Double_t A2 = ( trackOriginLadder0(0)-pointLadderToAlign(0) )*(  trackOriginLadder0(0)-pointLadderToAlign(0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B2 = ( trackOriginLadder0(1)-pointLadderToAlign(1) )*(  trackOriginLadder0(1)-pointLadderToAlign(1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C2 = ( trackOriginLadder0(2)-pointLadderToAlign(2) )*(  trackOriginLadder0(2)-pointLadderToAlign(2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);
     
    Double_t A = (hitLadder0(0)-ladderToAlignUV(0))*(hitLadder0(0)-ladderToAlignUV(0))/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B = (hitLadder0(1)-ladderToAlignUV(1))*(hitLadder0(1)-ladderToAlignUV(1))/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C = (tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign(0))*(tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign(0))/(2*sigmaX*sigmaX/(deltaZ*deltaZ));
    Double_t D = (tiltLadder0(1)-tiltLadderToAlign(1))*(tiltLadder0(1)-tiltLadderToAlign(1))/(2*sigmaY*sigmaY/(deltaZ*deltaZ));

/*
    if((A+B+C+D)>aChi2Limit)
    {
       currentMV0=(DataPoints*) dataMV0->After(currentMV0);
       currentMV=(DataPoints*) dataMV->After(currentMV);
       sizeMin--;
       ipt++;
       continue;
    }
*/

    f +=  A + B + (C + D); // Calcul du Chi2. 
    
    if (iflag==8) {
      DR3 temp = ladderToAlignUV - hitLadder0;
      DR3 tiltTemp = tiltLadderToAlign - tiltLadder0;

      if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
	{ 
	  printf("Point : ") ; hitLadder0.Print() ;
	  printf("Hit   : ") ; ladderToAlignUV.Print() ;
	  printf("diff  : ") ; temp.Print() ;
	  printf("\n") ;
	}
      fGraph[0].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(0),temp(0));
      fGraph[1].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(0),temp(1));
      fGraph[2].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(1),temp(0));
      fGraph[3].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(1),temp(1));
      fGraph[4].SetPoint(ipt,tiltLadderToAlign(0), tiltTemp(0));
      fGraph[5].SetPoint(ipt,tiltLadderToAlign(1), tiltTemp(1));
      fDu->Fill(temp(0));
      fDv->Fill(temp(1));
      fDw->Fill(temp(2));
      fDdu->Fill(tiltTemp(0));
      fDdv->Fill(tiltTemp(1));
      fDdw->Fill(f);
    }
    currentMV0 = (DataPoints*) dataMV0->After(currentMV0);
    currentMV  = (DataPoints*) dataMV->After(currentMV);

    sizeMin--;
    ipt++;
  }
  //cout <<"chi2 computed"<<endl;

  //f=f*f*f*f*f;

  if (iflag==9) {
    fAlignement->ListDataPoints();
  }
  if (iflag==10) {
    fGraph[0].Print();
  }

  if (iflag==8) 
    {
      //cout <<"iflag==8: final display"<<endl;
      
      if(AlignDebug >= 3) {fAlignement->PrintRotationMatrix();}
      //TPostScript ps("residus.ps"); //,-113
      //ps.NewPage();
      //fCnv = new TCanvas("Cnv","Residues after alignment",2,10,400,500);
      //fCnv->Divide(1,2);
      
      fCnv->cd(1);
      fDu->Fit("gaus","q");
      //fDu->Draw();
      //fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->cd(2);
      //gStyle->SetOptFit(1);
      fDv->Fit("gaus","q");
      //fDv->Draw();
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();
      // fCnv->Paint();
      //ps.NewPage();
      
      fCnv->cd(3);                                                                                                                                                            
      fDw->Fit("gaus","q");
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();

      fCnv->cd(4);
      fDdu->Fit("gaus","q");
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();
      
      fCnv->cd(5);
      fDdv->Fit("gaus","q");
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();

      fCnv->cd(6);
      fDdw->Fit("gaus","q");
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();
      
   for (Int_t i=0; i<6 ; i++) {
        fCcr->cd(i+1);
        fGraph[i].SetMarkerStyle(24);
        fGraph[i].SetMarkerColor(2);
        fGraph[i].SetMarkerSize(0.2);
        fGraph[i].Draw("AP");
      } 
      fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
      fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DU");
   //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
   //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
      fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
      fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DV");
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
      fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("V hit");
      fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DU");
    // fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
     // fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
      fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("V hit");
      fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DV");
    // fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
     //fGraph[3].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
      
      fGraph[4].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("DU");
      fGraph[4].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("Delta DU");
      
      fGraph[5].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("DV");
      fGraph[5].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("Delta DV");
      
      fCcr->Update();
      fCcr->Draw();
      // fCcr->Paint();      


      gROOT->GetListOfCanvases()->Write();
      //ps.Close();    
 
   }

  Double_t mypar[3];
  for(Int_t i=0; i<3; i++){
    mypar[i] = par[i]*180.00/3.141592653;
    mypar[i] = fmod(mypar[i],360.);
  }
 
  if(AlignDebug >=3) { printf(" tilt Z= %f \n tilt Y= %f \n tilt Z= %f \n Shift X= %f \n Shift Y= %f \n Z= %f \n N of entries %d Chi2 %f Chi2/DoF %f\n",mypar[0],mypar[1],mypar[2],par[3],par[4],par[5], ipt, f ,f/ipt);}

  //if (batch_mode == 1) cnv->SaveAs("t.ps");
}


//______________________________________________________________________________
//

void  MimosaAlignAnalysis::fcnMiniVectors2(Int_t &n, Double_t *gin, Double_t &f, Double_t *par , Int_t iflag)
{
     // fcn function used by the MINUIT Fitter
     //std::cout<<"fcn function used by the MINUIT Fitter"<<std::endl; 
     //DR3 Correction;
     
     Double_t resolution[3] = {3.5,3.5,10.0} ; // ??
     
     if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
     { 
         printf("Rotations : %11f %11f %11f\n",par[0],par[1],par[2]);
         printf("Translat. : %11f %11f %11f \n",par[3],par[4],par[5]);
         cout << "+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++" << endl;
      }  
   
//     ladderToAlign->UpdateAlignment();

     Double_t* initialRotations = fAlignement->GetInitialRotations();
     Double_t* initialPosition = fAlignement->GetInitialPosition(); 

     //std::cout<<"initialPositionX = "<<initialPosition[0]<<"  initialPositionY = "<<initialPosition[1]<<"  initialPositionZ = "<<initialPosition[2]<<std::endl;

     //ladderToAlign->UpdateAlignment();

     Double_t x = - par[3] * cos(par[5]) * sin(par[4]);
     Double_t y = par[3] * sin(par[5]) * sin(par[4]);
     Double_t z = par[3] * cos(par[4]);                

     fAlignement->SetTranslation( x, y, z );
     fAlignement->SetRotations(par[0],par[1],par[2]);

     //fAlignement->PrintAll();
      
     ladderToAlign->UpdateAlignment();

     fAlignement->PrintAll();

     std::cout<<" Th0 = "<<par[0]*180/3.141592653<<" Th1 = "<<par[1]*180/3.141592653<<" Th3 = "<<par[2]*180/3.141592653<<std::endl;
     std::cout<<"   X = "<<x-2*(x-initialPosition[0])<<"   Y = "<<y-2*(y-initialPosition[1])<<"   Z = "<<z-2*(z-initialPosition[2])<<std::endl;
     std::cout<<"   R = "<<par[3]<<" Theta = "<<par[4]<<" Phi = "<<par[5]<<std::endl;


     //Compute the chi-square
     f=0.0;

     TList *dataMV0 =  fAlignement->GetDataPoints();
     TList *dataMV =  fAlignement->GetDataPoints1();

     Int_t sizeMin = TMath::Min( fAlignement->DataSize(), fAlignement->DataSize1() );
      
     if (iflag==8) {
       fDu->Reset();
       fDv->Reset();
       fDw->Reset();
       fDdu->Reset();
       fDdv->Reset();
       fDdw->Reset();
     }

     DataPoints *currentMV0;
     DataPoints *currentMV;

     currentMV0 = (DataPoints*) dataMV0->First();
     currentMV = (DataPoints*) dataMV->First();

     Float_t sigmaX = 4.0;
     Float_t sigmaY = 4.0;
     Float_t sigmaZ = 4.0;

     Int_t ipt=0 ;

  while(/*currentMV*/ sizeMin>0) {
   
    DR3 hitLadder0 = currentMV0->GetHitPosition();
    DR3 ladderToAlignUV = currentMV->GetHitPosition();

    DR3 trackOriginLadder0 = currentMV0->GetTrackOrigin();
    DR3 pointLadderToAlign = currentMV->GetTrackOrigin();

    fAlignement0->CalculateIntersection(currentMV0);
    trackOriginLadder0 = fAlignement0->GetTrackPosition();
    hitLadder0 = fAlignement0->TransformTrackToPlane();

    DR3 tiltLadder0 = currentMV0->GetTrackDirection();
    DR3 tiltLadderToAlign = currentMV->GetTrackDirection();
    
    // The ladder move. We compute the new positions and tilts of minivectors.

    fAlignement->CalculateIntersection(currentMV);
    pointLadderToAlign = fAlignement->GetTrackPosition();
    ladderToAlignUV = fAlignement->TransformTrackToPlane();

    DR3 Point2 = fAlignement->RotateToTracker(ladderToAlignUV);  // Transform plane to tracker :)

    Point2(0) += fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[0];
    Point2(1) += fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[1];
    Point2(2) += fAlignement->GetInitialPosition()[2];

    // tilts change.

    tiltLadderToAlign(0) = tiltLadderToAlign(0) + (par[0]-initialRotations[0]) ;
    tiltLadderToAlign(1) = tiltLadderToAlign(1) + (par[1]-initialRotations[1]) ;
    tiltLadderToAlign(2) = tiltLadderToAlign(2) + (par[2]-initialRotations[2]) ;


    tiltLadderToAlign(0) /= fabs(tiltLadderToAlign(2));
    tiltLadderToAlign(1) /= fabs(tiltLadderToAlign(2));
    tiltLadderToAlign(2) /= fabs(tiltLadderToAlign(2));

    DataPoints* afterMoveLadder = new DataPoints(ladderToAlignUV(0), ladderToAlignUV(1), Point2(0), Point2(1), Point2(2) , tiltLadderToAlign(0),  tiltLadderToAlign(1) );

    // We have to re-make the tracks.
    // The ladder move and the tilts and center position change.
    // One can optain the points on the planes by using the DPrecALign of the planes (and not the DPrecAlign of the ladder).

    std::vector<DR3> myPlanePositions0;
    std::vector<DR3> myPlanePositions1;

    std::vector<DR3> myPlanePositions0_0;
    std::vector<DR3> myPlanePositions1_1;

    std::vector<DR3> myTrackerPosition0_0;
    std::vector<DR3> myTrackerPosition0_1;
    std::vector<DR3> myTrackerPosition1_0;
    std::vector<DR3> myTrackerPosition1_1;

    std::vector<DPlane*> myPlanes0;
    std::vector<DPlane*> myPlanes1;

    std::vector<DPlane*> myPlanes0_0;
    std::vector<DPlane*> myPlanes1_1;


    // We search the 2 points on the ladder 0 :)

    for(Int_t i = 1 ; i<=ladder0->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; i+=6 ) {
      DPlane* myPlane = ladder0->GetPlane(i);
      myPlanes0.push_back(myPlane);
      DPrecAlign* myPrecAlignPlane = myPlane->GetPrecAlignment();
      
      myPrecAlignPlane->CalculateIntersection( afterMoveLadder /*currentMV0*/);
      
      DR3 trackerPos = myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition();

      myTrackerPosition0_0.push_back(trackerPos);

      DR3 planePosition0 = myPrecAlignPlane->TransformHitToPlane(trackerPos); //  TransformTrackToPlane();
      
      /*
      DR3 tempPoint0 = myPrecAlignPlane->RotateToTracker(trackerPos);
      tempPoint0(0) += myPrecAlignPlane->GetTranslation()[0]; //ladder0->GetLadderPosition() + ladder0->GetPlanePosition(i);
      tempPoint0(1) += myPrecAlignPlane->GetTranslation()[1];      
      tempPoint0(2) += myPrecAlignPlane->GetTranslation()[2];
      */

      myPlanePositions0.push_back( /*myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition()*/  /*planePosition0*/ planePosition0 );//myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition();
    }
    
    // We search the 2 points on the ladder 1 :)

    for(Int_t i =1 ; i<=ladderToAlign->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; i+=6 ) {
    
      DPlane* myPlane_1 = ladderToAlign->GetPlane(i);
      myPlanes1.push_back(myPlane_1);
      DPrecAlign* myPrecAlignPlane = myPlane_1->GetPrecAlignment();     
      
      myPrecAlignPlane->CalculateIntersection(afterMoveLadder);
    
      DR3 trackerPos = myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition();  // in the plane frame.
      
      myTrackerPosition1_0.push_back(trackerPos);
      
      DR3 planePosition1 = myPrecAlignPlane->TransformHitToPlane(trackerPos); //TransformTrackToPlane();
      
      /*
      DR3 tempPoint1 = myPrecAlignPlane->RotateToTracker(trackerPos);
      
      tempPoint1(0) += myPrecAlignPlane->GetTranslation()[0];
      tempPoint1(1) += myPrecAlignPlane->GetTranslation()[1];
      tempPoint1(2) += myPrecAlignPlane->GetTranslation()[2];
      */

      myPlanePositions1.push_back( planePosition1 /*myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition()*/ ); 
     }

    for(Int_t i =1 ; i<=ladder0->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; i+=6 ) {
    
      DPlane* myPlane0_0 = ladder0->GetPlane(i);
      myPlanes0_0.push_back(myPlane0_0);
      DPrecAlign* myPrecAlignPlane = myPlane0_0->GetPrecAlignment();     
      
      myPrecAlignPlane->CalculateIntersection(currentMV0);
    
      DR3 trackerPos = myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition();  // in the plane frame.
      myTrackerPosition0_1.push_back(trackerPos);
      
      DR3 planePosition = myPrecAlignPlane->TransformHitToPlane(trackerPos); //TransformTrackToPlane();
      
      myPlanePositions0_0.push_back( planePosition /*myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition()*/ ); 
     }
 
    for(Int_t i =1 ; i<=ladderToAlign->GetNumberOfPlanes() ; i+=6 ) {
    
      DPlane* myPlane1_1 = ladderToAlign->GetPlane(i);
      myPlanes1_1.push_back(myPlane1_1);
      DPrecAlign* myPrecAlignPlane = myPlane1_1->GetPrecAlignment();     
      
      myPrecAlignPlane->CalculateIntersection(currentMV0);
    
      DR3 trackerPos = myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition();  // in the plane frame.
      myTrackerPosition1_1.push_back(trackerPos);
      
      DR3 planePosition = myPrecAlignPlane->TransformHitToPlane(trackerPos); //TransformTrackToPlane();
      
      myPlanePositions1_1.push_back( planePosition /*myPrecAlignPlane->GetTrackPosition()*/ ); 
     }

    // We have to make hits with the coordinate in the plane 1 and 6.
    // After, one can make a track with the 4 hits.
    
    DHit* myHit0_0 = new DHit(myPlanePositions0[0], *myPlanes0[0], 1); // /!\ must be plane coordinates ;)
    DHit* myHit0_1 = new DHit(myPlanePositions0[1], *myPlanes0[1], 2); 

    DHit* myHit1_0 = new DHit(myPlanePositions1[0], *myPlanes1[0], 3);
    DHit* myHit1_1 = new DHit(myPlanePositions1[1], *myPlanes1[1], 4);

    DHit* myHit3_0 = new DHit(myPlanePositions0_0[0], *myPlanes0_0[0], 5);
    DHit* myHit3_1 = new DHit(myPlanePositions0_0[1], *myPlanes0_0[1], 6);

    DHit* myHit4_0 = new DHit(myPlanePositions1_1[0], *myPlanes1_1[0], 7);
    DHit* myHit4_1 = new DHit(myPlanePositions1_1[1], *myPlanes1_1[1], 8);

    // We have to make the new track :) track from projection of ladder1 to ladder0

    DTrack*  myTrack_4Hits = new DTrack(4);
    Int_t trackNumber = 0;
                                     
    ladder0->MakeTrack4( myHit0_0, myHit0_1, myHit1_0, myHit1_1, myTrack_4Hits, trackNumber ); // /!\ coordinate in the plane frame /!\
                 
    DR3 positionPointLadder4 = myTrack_4Hits->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
    DR3 tiltPointLadder4 = myTrack_4Hits->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ();
    
    delete myTrack_4Hits;
 
    DataPoints* myDataPoint4 = new DataPoints();

    myDataPoint4->Set( 0., 0., positionPointLadder4(0), positionPointLadder4(1), positionPointLadder4(2), tiltPointLadder4(0), tiltPointLadder4(1) );

    // track projection of ladder0 to ladder1

    DTrack*  myTrack_4Hits_2 = new DTrack(4);
    Int_t trackNumber2 = 0;
                                     
    ladder0->MakeTrack4( myHit3_0, myHit3_1, myHit4_0, myHit4_1, myTrack_4Hits_2, trackNumber2 ); // /!\ coordinate in the plane frame /!\
                 
    DR3 positionPointLadder5 = myTrack_4Hits_2->GetLinearFit().GetOrigin();
    DR3 tiltPointLadder5 = myTrack_4Hits_2->GetLinearFit().GetSlopeZ();
    
    delete myTrack_4Hits_2;
 
    DataPoints* myDataPoint5 = new DataPoints();

    myDataPoint5->Set( 0., 0., positionPointLadder5(0), positionPointLadder5(1), positionPointLadder5(2), tiltPointLadder5(0), tiltPointLadder5(1) );



    // Compute the intersection with Ladder0

    //fAlignement->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint4);
    //DR3 intersectionLadderToAlign = fAlignement->GetTrackPosition();

    fAlignement0->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint4);
    pointLadderToAlign = fAlignement0->GetTrackPosition();
    ladderToAlignUV = fAlignement0->TransformHitToPlane(pointLadderToAlign);


//    pointLadderToAlign.Print();
//    ladderToAlignUV.Print();

/*
    fAlignement->CalculateIntersection(currentMV0);
    DR3 trackerCoordLadder0 = fAlignement->GetTrackPosition();
    DR3 planeCoordLadder0 = fAlignement->TransformHitToPlane(trackerCoordLadder0);


    fAlignement0->CalculateIntersection(afterMoveLadder);
    DR3 pointLadderToAlign0 = fAlignement0->GetTrackPosition();
    DR3 ladderToAlignUV0 = fAlignement0->TransformTrackToPlane();

    fAlignement->CalculateIntersection(myDataPoint5);
    DR3 trackerCoordLadder1 = fAlignement->GetTrackPosition();
*/
//    trackerCoordLadder0.Print();
//    planeCoordLadder0.Print();

    //ladderToAlignUV = planeCoordLadder0;
    DR3 tiltLadderToAlign1 = tiltLadderToAlign;
    tiltLadderToAlign = tiltPointLadder4;
    
    Float_t deltaZ = 1044.5*2.; // Dans le repere de l'echelle tjrs 2000 :) //*cos( (initialRotations[2]-par[2]) )*cos( (initialRotations[1]-par[1]) ); //ladderToAlignUV(2)-hitLadder0(2);
/*  
    Double_t A1 = ( trackerCoordLadder0(0)-Point2(0) )*( trackerCoordLadder0(0)-Point2(0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX); // diff sur ladder1
    Double_t B1 = ( trackerCoordLadder0(1)-Point2(1) )*( trackerCoordLadder0(1)-Point2(1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C1 = ( trackerCoordLadder0(2)-Point2(2) )*( trackerCoordLadder0(2)-Point2(2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);

    Double_t A2 = ( trackOriginLadder0(0)-pointLadderToAlign(0) )*(  trackOriginLadder0(0)-pointLadderToAlign(0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX); // diff sur ladder0
    Double_t B2 = ( trackOriginLadder0(1)-pointLadderToAlign(1) )*(  trackOriginLadder0(1)-pointLadderToAlign(1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C2 = ( trackOriginLadder0(2)-pointLadderToAlign(2) )*(  trackOriginLadder0(2)-pointLadderToAlign(2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ); 

    Double_t A3 = ( hitLadder0(0)-pointLadderToAlign0(0) )*( hitLadder0(0)-pointLadderToAlign0(0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX); // On LAdder0 in the tracker coordinates.
    Double_t B3 = ( hitLadder0(1)-pointLadderToAlign0(1) )*( hitLadder0(1)-pointLadderToAlign0(1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C3 = ( hitLadder0(2)-pointLadderToAlign0(2) )*( hitLadder0(2)-pointLadderToAlign0(2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);

    Double_t A4 = (hitLadder0(0)-ladderToAlignUV0(0))*(hitLadder0(0)-ladderToAlignUV0(0))/(sigmaX*sigmaX); // Sur Ladder0 ds plane coord.
    Double_t B4 = (hitLadder0(1)-ladderToAlignUV0(1))*(hitLadder0(1)-ladderToAlignUV0(1))/(sigmaY*sigmaY);

    Double_t A5 = ( Point2(0)-trackerCoordLadder1(0) )*( Point2(0)-trackerCoordLadder1(0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX); // Diff on Ladder1, in the tracker coordinates.
    Double_t B5 = ( Point2(1)-trackerCoordLadder1(1) )*( Point2(1)-trackerCoordLadder1(1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C5 = ( Point2(2)-trackerCoordLadder1(2) )*( Point2(2)-trackerCoordLadder1(2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);

    Double_t A = (hitLadder0(0)-ladderToAlignUV(0))*(hitLadder0(0)-ladderToAlignUV(0))/(sigmaX*sigmaX); // sur ladder0 expolation trace 4hits plane coord.
    Double_t B = (hitLadder0(1)-ladderToAlignUV(1))*(hitLadder0(1)-ladderToAlignUV(1))/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    
    Double_t D = (tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign(0))*(tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign(0))/(2*sigmaX*sigmaX/(deltaZ*deltaZ));
    Double_t E = (tiltLadder0(1)-tiltLadderToAlign(1))*(tiltLadder0(1)-tiltLadderToAlign(1))/(2*sigmaY*sigmaY/(deltaZ*deltaZ));

    Double_t D1 = (tiltPointLadder5(0)-tiltLadderToAlign1(0))*(tiltPointLadder5(0)-tiltLadderToAlign1(0))/(2*sigmaX*sigmaX/(deltaZ*deltaZ));
    Double_t E1 = (tiltPointLadder5(1)-tiltLadderToAlign1(1))*(tiltPointLadder5(1)-tiltLadderToAlign1(1))/(2*sigmaY*sigmaY/(deltaZ*deltaZ));
*/
    Double_t D2 = (tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign1(0))*(tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign1(0))/(2*sigmaX*sigmaX/(deltaZ*deltaZ));
    Double_t E2 = (tiltLadder0(1)-tiltLadderToAlign1(1))*(tiltLadder0(1)-tiltLadderToAlign1(1))/(2*sigmaY*sigmaY/(deltaZ*deltaZ));
/*
    Double_t A6 = ( myHit3_0->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit0_0->GetPositionUhitCG() )*( myHit3_0->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit0_0->GetPositionUhitCG() )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B6 = ( myHit3_0->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit0_0->GetPositionVhitCG() )*( myHit3_0->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit0_0->GetPositionVhitCG() )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);

    Double_t A7 = ( myHit3_1->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit0_1->GetPositionUhitCG() )*( myHit3_1->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit0_1->GetPositionUhitCG() )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B7 = ( myHit3_1->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit0_1->GetPositionVhitCG() )*( myHit3_1->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit0_1->GetPositionVhitCG() )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);

    Double_t A8 = ( myHit4_0->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit1_0->GetPositionUhitCG() )*( myHit4_0->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit1_0->GetPositionUhitCG() )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B8 = ( myHit4_0->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit1_0->GetPositionVhitCG() )*( myHit4_0->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit1_0->GetPositionVhitCG() )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);

    Double_t A9 = ( myHit4_1->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit1_1->GetPositionUhitCG() )*( myHit4_1->GetPositionUhitCG()-myHit1_1->GetPositionUhitCG() )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B9 = ( myHit4_1->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit1_1->GetPositionVhitCG() )*( myHit4_1->GetPositionVhitCG()-myHit1_1->GetPositionVhitCG() )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
*/
    Double_t A10 = ( myTrackerPosition0_0[0](0)-myTrackerPosition0_1[0](0) )*( myTrackerPosition0_0[0](0)-myTrackerPosition0_1[0](0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B10 = ( myTrackerPosition0_0[0](1)-myTrackerPosition0_1[0](1) )*( myTrackerPosition0_0[0](1)-myTrackerPosition0_1[0](1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C10 = ( myTrackerPosition0_0[0](2)-myTrackerPosition0_1[0](2) )*( myTrackerPosition0_0[0](2)-myTrackerPosition0_1[0](2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);

    Double_t A11 = ( myTrackerPosition0_0[1](0)-myTrackerPosition0_1[1](0) )*( myTrackerPosition0_0[1](0)-myTrackerPosition0_1[1](0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B11 = ( myTrackerPosition0_0[1](1)-myTrackerPosition0_1[1](1) )*( myTrackerPosition0_0[1](1)-myTrackerPosition0_1[1](1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C11 = ( myTrackerPosition0_0[1](2)-myTrackerPosition0_1[1](2) )*( myTrackerPosition0_0[1](2)-myTrackerPosition0_1[1](2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);

    Double_t A12 = ( myTrackerPosition1_0[0](0)-myTrackerPosition1_1[0](0) )*( myTrackerPosition1_0[0](0)-myTrackerPosition1_1[0](0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B12 = ( myTrackerPosition1_0[0](1)-myTrackerPosition1_1[0](1) )*( myTrackerPosition1_0[0](1)-myTrackerPosition1_1[0](1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C12 = ( myTrackerPosition1_0[0](2)-myTrackerPosition1_1[0](2) )*( myTrackerPosition1_0[0](2)-myTrackerPosition1_1[0](2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);

    Double_t A13 = ( myTrackerPosition1_0[1](0)-myTrackerPosition1_1[1](0) )*( myTrackerPosition1_0[1](0)-myTrackerPosition1_1[1](0) )/(sigmaX*sigmaX);
    Double_t B13 = ( myTrackerPosition1_0[1](1)-myTrackerPosition1_1[1](1) )*( myTrackerPosition1_0[1](1)-myTrackerPosition1_1[1](1) )/(sigmaY*sigmaY);
    Double_t C13 = ( myTrackerPosition1_0[1](2)-myTrackerPosition1_1[1](2) )*( myTrackerPosition1_0[1](2)-myTrackerPosition1_1[1](2) )/(sigmaZ*sigmaZ);


    //Double_t C1 = (tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign(0))*(tiltLadder0(0)-tiltLadderToAlign(0))/(2*sigmaX*sigmaX/(deltaZ*deltaZ));

    f +=/* (A3 + B3 + C3)*/ A10 + B10 + C10 + A11 + B11 + /*C11+*/ A12 + B12 + C12 + A13 + B13 + C13 /*(A + B) +*//*  (A5 + B5 + C5) */ + 80*(D2+E2) /* + myTrack_4Hits->GetChiSquare()*10000 */; // Calcul du Chi2.    
   
//    std::cout<<" partie coord = "<< A10 + B10 + C10 + A11 + B11 + C11+ A12 + B12 + C12 + A13 + B13 + C13<<"   Partie angulaire = "<<80*(D2+E2)<<std::endl; 
   
   /* 
    DR3 position_3_0 = *(myHit3_0->GetPosition());
    DR3 position_0_0 = *(myHit0_0->GetPosition());
*/
    delete afterMoveLadder;
    delete myDataPoint4;
    delete myDataPoint5;
    
    delete myHit0_0;
    delete myHit0_1;
    delete myHit1_0;
    delete myHit1_1;

    delete myHit3_0;
    delete myHit3_1;
    delete myHit4_0;
    delete myHit4_1;

    //DR3 position_3_0 = *(myHit3_0->GetPosition()); 
    //DR3 position_0_0 = *(myHit0_0->GetPosition()); 
    //DR3 ladder0_Diff_face_1 = position_3_0 - position_0_0;

    if (iflag==8) {
      DR3 temp = myTrackerPosition1_0[0]-myTrackerPosition1_1[0];// ladder0_Diff_face_1; /* trackOriginLadder0-pointLadderToAlign; */ /*ladderToAlignUV0 - hitLadder0;*/ // /*trackerCoordLadder0-Point2;*/ Point2-trackerCoordLadder1;
      DR3 tiltTemp = tiltLadderToAlign1 - tiltLadder0; /*tiltPointLadder5-tiltLadderToAlign1*/;

      if(AlignDebug >= 3) 
	{ 
	  printf("Point : ") ; hitLadder0.Print() ;
	  printf("Hit   : ") ; ladderToAlignUV.Print() ;
	  printf("diff  : ") ; temp.Print() ;
	  printf("\n") ;
	}
      fGraph[0].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(0),temp(0));
      fGraph[1].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(0),temp(1));
      fGraph[2].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(1),temp(0));
      fGraph[3].SetPoint(ipt,hitLadder0(1),temp(1));
      fGraph[4].SetPoint(ipt,tiltLadderToAlign(0), tiltTemp(0));
      fGraph[5].SetPoint(ipt,tiltLadderToAlign(1), tiltTemp(1));
      fDu->Fill(temp(0));
      fDv->Fill(temp(1));
      fDw->Fill(temp(2));
      fDdu->Fill(tiltTemp(0));
      fDdv->Fill(tiltTemp(1));
      fDdw->Fill(f);
    }
    currentMV0 = (DataPoints*) dataMV0->After(currentMV0);
    currentMV  = (DataPoints*) dataMV->After(currentMV);

    sizeMin--;
    ipt++;
  }
  
  //f = f*f*f;

  //cout <<"chi2 computed"<<endl;

  if (iflag==9) {
    fAlignement->ListDataPoints();
  }
  if (iflag==10) {
    fGraph[0].Print();
  }

  if (iflag==8) 
    {
      //cout <<"iflag==8: final display"<<endl;
      
      if(AlignDebug >= 3) {fAlignement->PrintRotationMatrix();}
      //TPostScript ps("residus.ps"); //,-113
      //ps.NewPage();
      //fCnv = new TCanvas("Cnv","Residues after alignment",2,10,400,500);
      //fCnv->Divide(1,2);
      
      fCnv->cd(1);
      //fDu->Fit("gaus","q");
      fDu->Draw();
      //fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->cd(2);
      //gStyle->SetOptFit(1);
      //fDv->Fit("gaus","q");
      fDv->Draw();
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();
      // fCnv->Paint();
      //ps.NewPage();
      
      fCnv->cd(3);                                                                                                                                                            
      //fDw->Fit("gaus","q");
      fDw->Draw();
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();

      fCnv->cd(4);
      fDdu->Draw();
      //fDdu->Fit("gaus","q");
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();
      
      fCnv->cd(5);
      //fDdv->Fit("gaus","q");
      fDdv->Draw();
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();

      fCnv->cd(6);
      //fDdw->Fit("gaus","q");
      fDdw->Draw();
      fCnv->Update();
      fCnv->Draw();
      
   for (Int_t i=0; i<6 ; i++) {
        fCcr->cd(i+1);
        fGraph[i].SetMarkerStyle(24);
        fGraph[i].SetMarkerColor(2);
        fGraph[i].SetMarkerSize(0.2);
        fGraph[i].Draw("AP");
      } 
      fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
      fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DU");
   //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
   //  fGraph[0].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
      fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("U hit");
      fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetYTitle("DV");
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMinimum(-2000.);
    // fGraph[1].GetHistogram()->SetMaximum(2000.);
      fGraph[2].GetHistogram()->SetXTitle("V hit");
